title: The victory of Catalonia, or, The double cuckold made English by James Morgan.
author: Brémond, Gabriel de.
publisher: Printed by J.B. for James Magnes and Richard Bentley ...,
notes: Attributed to Brémond by Wing and NUC pre-1956 prints.
Translation of Le double cocu. Published also under titles : Le vice-roi de Catalogne, Le cocu content, and Histoire galante d'un double cocu--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
